doc.title: Rock Hard
doc.plot: An outrageous roller coaster ride of sex, rock, and self-fulfillment, ROCK HARD gets up-close and personal with the stars of porn they foray into the music industry. San Fernando Valley. 8:30am: Jim Powers kicks back in a tiny office filled with WALL TO WALL videos. All porn. All produced by him. Eager talent is easy to find, as he recruits up to a dozen new girls each day. In the distinct lingo of the industry, they're paid per scene, per hole and per gender. Fast money. Nina Whett stands in a local liquor store for the fifth of Jack Daniels that enables her to face her day's work as an adult entertainer. Two hours of make-up, an enema, a douche and sex with a complete stranger. She'll probably leave with close to two grand in her pocket, but at what price to her psyche? She dreams of one day making it as a rock star but today she has to pay the bills. Can porn stars be rock stars? Ex-legendary porn star Madison slept with every rock star in the eighties and is now ready to explore life as a rocker herself. Her band tours the L.A. club scene, hitting up the usual suspects as she struggles to find legitimacy on the "other side." Success. Being a part of the mainstream media. Respect. This is what drives the stars of ROCK HARD to pursue their dreams of making music. Rock. Alternative. Punk. Soul. The music industry is a billion dollar industry yet it is financially dwarfed by the money-machine that is porn. From porn to rock; ROCK HARD is an unconventional and rare insight into the underground world of SEX, DRUGS and ROCK N' ROLL.
